txt.en: This sculpture was carved by Bhai-buri-Ghân before he was slain by Orcs, and it was gifted to you by his brother Khôr-buri-Ghân, who was grateful for your help in discovering this unseen side of his brother. It was taken into Mordor, but has returned and been cleansed of the evil that corrupted it. Elrond has imbued it with the Light of Eärendil, and believes it will help you banish the shadows of Mordor.
